name: I Wanna Be The Brothers
description:
I Wanna Be The Brothers

     =======================

     Version 0.9.2 - 28 nov

  It's a classic game you know and love, but featuring The Kid!

        - Wow, It's like a ROM hack!

        - Lots of wacky references to classic I Wanna Be The Guy Fangames!

        - 3 Different Physics Modes!

        - C.B.T. Stands for Can't Beat This (if you know you know)

  Made in 4 days during the hot brazilian summer of 2021

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  CREATED BY

  ----------

        - renex

        - Kousaku-P

        - Natsu

        - Renko

        - Duncan

        - Floogle

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  -------------------

  A modern PC (Pentium 3 or higher) running Windows XP,

  NT5 or 2000 is required. After installation the

  program uses about 7000 KB disk space. The program

  prefers 4 million colors (true color, 32-bit).

  It requires at least 640x480 screen resolution.

  DirectX 8 or higher is required (not included).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
